nodes.text: The master of the BB-series astromech droid JB-7 was a kind individual. In 34 ABY, he upgraded all of the droid's vital parts, including its photoreceptor, arc welder, and welding torch. Following the upgrade, the droid called into the radio show Droid Station Frequency 3-7-6-4-3-7 on station BSO 401.72, which was based in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu, in order to donate its old spare parts, stating that they came from a moisture and creature-free home.

JB-7's was mentioned in the background radio loop of the themed land Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park and Disney's Hollywood Studios Park in 2019. He is only mentioned by JB-7 in binary, with a translation of what its saying available from staff.
